short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces new tab page with beautiful background images, inspirational quotes and displays the time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension replaces the new tab page of your browser with a beautiful background image that changes randomly every time you open a new tab, and it displays the time, and there are inspirational quotes that change randomly every time you open a new tab.
